summary: The diff implements a BigInt-safe task comparison utility and updates mission autosave change-detection to avoid JSON.stringify on BigInt-containing tasks (likely addressing the freeze/blank-screen). However, it also includes additional autosave behavioral changes (save-queuing and mission-switch resets) and updates to project metadata/summary files that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Autosave behavior enhancements beyond BigInt-safe comparison: queuing pending updates while a save is in progress and resetting autosave internal state on missionId change.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 asks only to make change-detection BigInt-safe (avoid JSON.stringify on BigInt). The added queuing/mission-switch reset logic changes autosave behavior beyond comparison logic, and the BuildRequest constraints ask to avoid changing app functionality beyond the freeze/blank-screen fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to repository metadata/state tracking files (project_state.json) marking requests as pending and adding project notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; unrelated to the runtime bug fix requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification to frontend-file-summaries.txt containing broad component feature descriptions unrelated to the targeted bug fix.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and not necessary to implement REQ-1/REQ-2; also suggests unrelated changes (though this is only a summary file).
